name: LYS (Killian Delias (crazyk1k1))
description:
LYS is a game about the story of a children who want to show you his story in a park of Bordeaux : "Le Jardin Public".

This is a Treasure Hunt game in a magic and fantasy version of the park !

You can explore unique locations, speak to animal, take flower and more to complete your book !

On Artstation : https://www.artstation.com/artwork/18nPLZ

Credits :

Eva Lecocq

Théo Martin

Clément Cousseau

Killian Delias
